definition: dictionary/also written 辭典|辞典[ci2 dian3]/CL:部[bu4],本[ben3]
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn
Hanyu Da Cidian, the largest Chinese dictionary, with over 375,000 word entries, first published 1986-1994

pinyin: Lu4 tou4 jin1 rong2 ci2 dian3

sentences.english: The headwords in this dictionary are in bold type.
sentences.chinese: 本词典的词条用的是粗体字。
这词典有十四万多条目。

sentences.english: My English-Chinese Dictionary has disappeared. Who could have taken it?
sentences.chinese: 我的叶英汉词典曳不见了，谁可能把它拿走了呢？

sentences.english: The 5th edition Oxford English-Chinese Dictionary is much thicker than the 4th one.
sentences.chinese: 第五版牛津英汉双解词典比第四版厚得多。

sentences.english: In this dictionary both spelling is show when both is possible.
sentences.chinese: 在两种拼法皆可时，本词典将之一并列出。

sentences.english: I'm going to buy some story-books and a Chinese-English and English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我要去买些故事书和一个中国的英国和英汉语词典。

sentences.english: Even if everything dictionary at hand, we can not only lead them.
sentences.chinese: 即便手头的词典应有尽有，也不能唯它们的马首是瞻。

sentences.english: I spent fifty yuan on a new dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我花了五十元钱买了一本新词典。

sentences.english: Lettered words has the qualifications to enter Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 字母词有资格进入汉语词典。

sentences.english: This dictionary is compiled by a famous linguist.
sentences.chinese: 这本词典是一位著名的语言学家编篡的。

sentences.english: I shall go $30 for the dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我愿出30美元买这部词典。

sentences.english: Those words do not belong in modem dictionaries.
sentences.chinese: 那些词在现代的词典中查不到。

sentences.english: Yo momma's so ugly, when you look up ugly in the dictionary it has her picture.
sentences.chinese: 你妈是个丑八怪，词典里查丑怪就查出她的脸。

sentences.english: This book fills a major gap in lexicography.
sentences.chinese: 这本书填补了词典学方面的重大缺门。

sentences.english: I can't think where I put the diction-ary.
sentences.chinese: 我记不起把那部词典放哪儿了。

sentences.english: I can read the English book without a dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我可以不用词典读这本英文书。

definition: Chinese character dictionary (containing entries for single characters, contrasted with a 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3], which has entries for words of one or more characters)/(coll.) dictionary/CL:本[ben3]
dictionary/also written 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3]/CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
Cihai, an encyclopedic dictionary first published in 1915, and frequently revised
new word (in textbook)/word that is unfamiliar or not yet studied/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
